text: This is a list of American television-related events in 1926. ==Events== {| width=100% class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCFF" align="left" ! Date !! Event |- valign="top" | November 15 || The National Broadcasting Company (NBC) is formed as a radio network by Westinghouse, General Electric, and RCA. |} ==See also== * 1926 in the United States * List of American films of 1926 ==References== Television American
title: 1926 in American television
